TopicTitle: What is the status of BDA, ALG, and Mouse Aim Flight?

Articles.Content: For 1.2, the toolbar for BDA isn't working and I can't right click parts, and ALG is just completely messed up.  Mouse Aim Flight is broken also.  I can't find any info on them for 1.2 so if anyone could help me out that'd be nice.

The original thread was deleted by some unfortunate circumstances,but i think you'll find everything here:

p.s.:ALG is being worked on , so don't poke the hornet's nest.
